import React, { useState } from 'react'; const UnitDetails = ({ property, onClose, onInquireNow = () => {} }) => { const [currentImageIndex, setCurrentImageIndex] = useState(0); if (!property) return null; const nextImage = () => { setCurrentImageIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex === property.images.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1 ); }; const prevImage = () => { setCurrentImageIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex === 0 ? property.images.length - 1 : prevIndex - 1 ); }; const goToImage = (index) => { setCurrentImageIndex(index); }; const handleInquiry = () => { onInquireNow(); }; const handleSave = () => { // TODO: Implement save to favorites logic alert('Property saved to your favorites!'); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Unit Details

Property Information

{/* Scrollable Content */}
{/* Image Carousel */}
{property.images.length > 1 && ( <>
{currentImageIndex + 1} / {property.images.length}
{property.images.map((_, index) => (
)}
{/* Title / Location / Price */}

{property.name || 'Property'}

{property.location}
{property.price}

per month

{/* Features */}
{property.bedrooms || 'N/A'} bed{property.bedrooms !== 1 ? 's' : ''}
{property.bathrooms || 'N/A'} bathroom{property.bathrooms !== 1 ? 's' : ''}
{property.kitchens || 'N/A'} kitchen{property.kitchens !== 1 ? 's' : ''}
{property.area || 'N/A'}m
{/* Details */}

Details

{property.description || 'No description available for this property.'}

{/* Company & Property Manager */}

Company & Management

Company

{property.company || 'N/A'}

Property Manager

{property.propertyManager || 'N/A'}

{/* Review Rating */}

Property Rating

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))}
{property.rating || '0.0'} / 5.0
Based on

{property.reviewCount || '0'} reviews

{/* Reviews Comments */}

Recent Reviews

{property.reviews && property.reviews.length > 0 ? ( property.reviews.slice(0, 3).map((review, index) => (
{review.reviewerName ? review.reviewerName.charAt(0).toUpperCase() : 'A'}

{review.reviewerName || `Anonymous User ${index + 1}`}

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))} {review.rating}/5
{review.date || 'N/A'}

{review.comment || 'No comment available.'}

)) ) : (

No reviews yet

Be the first to review this property!

)}
{/* Landmarks */}

Nearby Landmarks

{property.landmarks && property.landmarks.length > 0 ? ( property.landmarks.map((landmark, index) => (
{landmark.name}
{landmark.distance}
)) ) : (

No landmarks information available

)}
{/* Sticky Footer Actions */}
); }; export default UnitDetails;
